title: Carlo Fazzari
text:
Carlo Fazzari (born 7 April 1990) is a former <a href="Italy">Italian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who played as a <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a>.
He played for <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a> in the <a href="Pro14">Pro12</a>, from 2012/13 to 2013/14. He currently plays for <a href="Petrarca%20Padova%20Rugby">Petrarca Padova Rugby</a>.
He played as prop for several Italian Teams, winning the national league in 2011. 
Owner of several clinics in his hometown Brescia. 
CEO of Brainstimualtion Italia, organization that provide neurostimolation treatments for mental health issues.
